byline.original: By CORINNA da FONSECA-WOLLHEIM, VIVIEN SCHWEITZER and ANTHONY TOMMASINI

abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews Alpine Echoes, yodeling performance led by new-music specialist Joan La Barbara in Washington Heights; Vivien Schweitzer reviews Make Music Winter, Indian music event led by composer Ravi Kittappa in Athens Square Park in Astoria, Queens; Antony Tommasini reviews Pilgrimage, music event led by choral conductor Malcolm J Merriweather in Morningside Heights.
lead_paragraph: Whooping, chanting and caroling, reviewers from The Times sampled three of the 12 musical parades organized as part of this annual event.

headline.main: In Make Music Winter, Critics Find Their Inner Yodelers and Pilgrims
headline.print_headline: In Make Music Winter, Critics Find Their Inner Yodelers and Pilgrims

snippet: Whooping, chanting and caroling, reviewers from The Times sampled three of the 12 musical parades organized as part of this annual event.
